original_text: And he made a mercy seat of pure gold. Two cubits and a half was its length, and a cubit and a half its breadth.
korean_text: 순금으로 속죄소를 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗 반, 너비가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And he made a mercy seat of pure gold.
Two cubits and a half was its length,
and a cubit and a half its breadth.
